post:
Hosteons.com is a Singapore based company. We provide VPS Hosting Services with servers co-located in LA, USA. All our VPS Packages comes with unmetered bandwidth, RAID 10 SSD and also includes DDOS Protection at no additional charge.

We are using SolusVM along with KVM and OpenVZ 7 for virtualisation. With complete access to RDNS, Reboot, Reinstall, also all our VPS comes with a free /64 IPv6 per VPS in addition to the IPv4 allocation as per your VPS Package. Our VPS also comes with Free DDOS Protection.

Coupon/offer details for all VPS Packages:
“INTRO20” - This coupon gives 20% one discount on all billing cycles (Annual billing cycle gives you additional 25% discount)
"DOUBLERAM" - This coupon gives you DOUBLE RAM irrespective of your billing cycle.
"DOUBLEDISK" - This coupon gives you DOUBLE SSD Disk Space irrespective of your billing cycle.
"DOUBLEPORT" - This coupon gives you DOUBLE NETWORK PORT Speed i.e. 200 Mbps Unmetered Port irrespective of your billing cycle.

Some of the features of our VPS hosting service:

1) SolusVM VPS Control Panel to reboot and reinstall
2) VNC Access (HTML 5 as well as Java)
3) DDOS Protection
4) Instant Activation
5) Free IPv4 as well as Free IPv6 (/64)
6) Full RDNS Control
7) IRC Allowed
8) Private Proxy/VPN Allowed
9) China Optimised network also included at no additional charge.
10) RAID 10 SSD Drives (We use Pure SSD for best Disk I/O Performance)
11) KVM Virtualization.
12) Unmetered Bandwidth.
13) cPanel optional.
14) Windows OS also available depending upon VPS Package.

If any queries please submit a ticket from our website https://hosteons.com

Affiliates are also welcome, we offer flat 20% affiliate commission to all our affiliates
